scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix be && npm install --prefix fe
scripts.build:all: npm --prefix be run build && npm --prefix fe run build
scripts.start:all: concurrently -n "be,fe" -c "cyan,green" "npm --prefix be run start" "npm --prefix fe run start"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n "be,fe" -c "cyan,green" "npm --prefix be run dev" "npm --prefix fe run dev"
